id.description: (required) A unique identifier for the resource

locationSet.$comment: See location-conflation documentation for compatible values: https://github.com/ideditor/location-conflation#readme
locationSet.description: (required) included and excluded locations for this resource

languageCodes.description: (optional) Array of ISO-639-1 (2 letter) or ISO-639-3 (3 letter) codes in lowercase

name.$comment: Assumed to be in English, this value will be sent to Transifex for translation
name.description: (required) Display name for this community resource

description.$comment: Assumed to be in English, this value will be sent to Transifex for translation
description.description: (required) One line description of the community resource

extendedDescription.$comment: Assumed to be in English, this value will be sent to Transifex for translation
extendedDescription.description: (optional) Longer description of the community resource

url.description: (required) A url link to visit the community resource

signupUrl.description: (optional) A url link to sign up for the community resource

contacts.description: (optional) People to contact about this community resource

order.$comment: When several resources with same geography are present, this controls the display order.
order.description: (optional) Suggested sort order for this resource (default = 0, higher numbers display more prominently)

i18n.description: (optional) if true, `name`, `description` and `where` will be translated

id.description: (required if i18n=true) A unique identifier for the event

name.$comment: In local language by default, in English if `i18n=true`

description.$comment: In local language by default, in English if `i18n=true`
description.description: (required) One line description of the event

where.$comment: In local language by default, in English if `i18n=true`

when.description: (required) When the event is (Should be a string parseable by Date.parse, and assumed to be local time zone for the event)

url.description: (optional) A url link for the event

countryCoder.$comment: See country-coder documentation for compatible values: https://github.com/ideditor/country-coder#readme
countryCoder.description: A country code (ISO 3166-1, United Nations M49, or anything recognized by country-coder)

coordinatePair.description: A coordinate pair formatted as [longitude, latitude]

geojsonFilename.description: A filename for one of the geojson features in this project
